reviews.review_msg: This TA comes off unprofessional. I asked her if she could post the slides before class, especially being connected to CAL and she agreed and said she'd have them done anyway since she teacher a class before this one. Not only did she NOT share them before class, she'd do it sometimes a day or so after and complains we're not paying attention.
Extremely rude and snarky it's kind of strange and highly unprofessional.
She appears friendly in class but soon as spoken to privately she gets quite rude. It's confusing.
very critical and judgmental on personal appearances and ethnicity. Harsh and rude generally if you're not a native Canadian.

One of the worst.  Very racist, will be nice to you only if u are native! 
 We were asked to rate her , which she handed in herself. And we were asked to write with pencil which she erased and marked different numbers. After which we had to openly tell the prof,  and she ended marking us so bad. luckily my other exams were marked by my prof

Will bark research at you and expect you to understand. Doesn't know how to break down key concepts or research into digestible content. Exams are very difficult - no study guide, and so much info/research covered throughout course you'd need to memorize every little detail of lectures and texts. Also very condescending??

Madison is great! I enjoyed clinical forensic psyc with her, she incorporated a lot of research (as necessary), but the content was interesting. The project throughout the semester applied to course content and honestly was one of the best parts of the course! The exams are quite difficult, but I wouldn't say it is a major deterrent!
